p: Adult C. maculatus were obtained from the municipality of Crato, Ceará State, Brazil in 2014. These insects were kept in 1.5 L glass flasks with Vigna unguiculata cv. always-green grains with moisture content of 10.7% wet basis (w.b.). These flasks were kept in an air-conditioned room at a temperature of 27 ± 2 °C, relative humidity of 75 ± 5% and a 12 h photo period.
